name: @datagrok/chembl-browser
description: Chembl Browser is a [package](https://datagrok.ai/help/develop/develop#packages) for the [Datagrok](https://datagrok.ai) platform. The goal of the project is to demonstrate opportunities of the platform to build usable apps with a comfortable interface to search and view data. The initial version is based on [Chembl Database](https://www.ebi.ac.uk/chembl/g/#search_results/all) - ChEMBL is a manually curated database of bioactive molecules with drug-like properties.
